archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Customer Order Eligibility
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: The Customer Order Commercial Eligibility function validates that the Offer & products specified on the Customer Order, are available and feasible from a commercial and functional point of view. It includes: � Commercial Eligibility with commercial compatibility with the already customer installed Offers � Functional Eligibility with functional compatibility with the already customer installed Products. � � Customer Credit Eligibility check, considering the payment history and the credit scores for a Customer, only the predictive credit score for a ProspectiveCustomer. � The technical feasibility is covered by th Service Availability function.
